You must be logged in to leave a comment. Submit Characters: ... pulius Hello ! I am interested in your materials in hotel&restaurant management,design, costs, etc. I am from Romania and we lack here a lot of these practical materials.Thank you in advance : p_d_paul@yahoo.com reply 04 / 24 / 2011 Brooke Marlowe Grabowski is there any way that i can get this as well. I am an interior design student working on my first comm. space assignment. This information is gold and would help me with my space planning as I really have no clue as to space req. PLEASE HELP! thanks reply 02 / 05 / 2011 shafiqbogra hi could plz send me this book. thanks, m s islam reply 02 / 20 / 2010 patrice1966 hi , i m interested . pbouttier@yahoo.fr reply 01 / 05 / 2010 Comment must not be empty.
